data.description:
FIGHT with any weapon you can find against different enemies in the Hex7 Arenas. 
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031640_1611492052972544_8434024045580790583_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=sBiRJZcYLFMQ7kNvgE8wT5i&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBl49hvxVmw-G7a-rEXtQb3y84upPh8qW_jQRK2e01Zjg&oe=66B87C4C)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game as much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39035393_1502492917145105_2500292279720560247_n.png?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=GvjoLrLpSPAQ7kNvgH6xpTz&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBdPSlML3-gM3FhpNrHvUQ35GA10h7a5aNDpNehBlDoCA&oe=66B8B29F)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75392879_331169873202633_892518978300243902_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=9sDfxDsuvGAQ7kNvgHkZarF&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCD2ZiYZkVv8t0hDMWqyvpR45YVF9zkesjn7PHM_-cK9w&oe=66B897F1)
